segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to be waken up tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , how long is it from here to the train station ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you take a taxi , it will be 20 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then please wake me up at 7 : OO.Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
